import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ThemeService } from '../_service/dark-mode.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', }) export class LoginComponent { constructor(public themeService: ThemeService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} toggleTheme(): void { this.themeService.toggleTheme(); } }
